Babyâ€™s first Container

First take a look at your Docker environment: To see the images downloaded to you system run:

    ~$ docker images (There should be none)

Very minimal example of a Docker container:

    ~$ docker run hello-world

Now run the docker images command again, you should see that it automatically downloaded the necessary image.

Next: Nginx Web Server

Refs

[https://hub.docker.com//hello-world](https://hub.docker.com//hello-world)
